Installation:

- Create /home/upnp/sys
- Copy the following files to /home/upnp/sys:
    display.py
    graphutils.py
    screens.py

- Add the contents of rc.local to /etc/init.d/rc.local, before the "exit 0" statement.
- Copy initscipts/bootled to /etc/init.d
- Copy initscripts/oled to /etc/init.d
- sudo update-rc.d oled stop
